description:
The team interrogates the impostor they captured to learn more of the plot to assassinate the Shogun. The search for Sakai and the Furies leads to a violent climax, forcing Hijikata to make life-or-death decisions for several Shinsengumi members.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Stars Meet, Searching the Galaxy
星迎え, 雲漢の調べ
